author: bridge-bot
content:
<katya_rz> Labels for valid/invalid attestations metrics have been merged. `is_from_block=true` means `source=block`, `is_from_block=false` corresponds to `source=gossip` based on the [specs](https://github.com/leanEthereum/leanSpec/blob/main/src/lean_spec/subspecs/forkchoice/store.py#L251-L253). Feel free to update the metrics in your clients.

https://github.com/leanEthereum/leanMetrics/pull/15
